About Work Team Contact Us

PROF.(DR.) S.M.K. RIZVI

DEAN STUDENT WELFARE & CHIEF PROCTOR - (HEAD, AAINA)

Aaina is the largest student community of Babu Banarasi Das University invloved in organising and managing of various events of the university as well as helping in conducting prelims of fests of different colleges(even involving IITs). Under the guidance PROF.(DR.) S.M.K. RIZVI sir, team aaina is commited to help students through different forums and providing exposure to the students.

Gallery

welcome to our gallery showing some of our work. Follow our instagram page (@aaina_bbdu) for more.

aaina team working for auditions of utkarsh(annual fest of BBDU)

IIT Guwahati Fest

Alcheringa

the annual cultural festival of IIT Guwahati called Alcheringa comes to BBD for prelims.

IIT Patna Fest

Anwesha

the annual cultural festival of IIT Patna called Anwesha comes to BBD for prelims.

IIT Kanpur Fest

Antaragni

the annual cultural festival of IIT Kanpur called Antaragni comes to BBD for prelims.

BBD University Fest

Utkarsh

the annual techno-cultural festival of BBD University called Utkarsh is held every year.

IIT Roorkee Fest

Thomso

the annual cultural festival of IIT Roorkee called Thomso held its zonals.

BBD University

Ganesh Mahotsav

the ganesh mahotsav is held every year in BBD university.
